Settings.Name: NPC
Settings.Tooltip: Choose which NPC to display.

Settings.Name: Page
Settings.Tooltip: Choose which options page to display.

Settings.Name: LevelBonus
Settings.Tooltip:
Scale NPC's to Party Level + X.
Set to a large negative with 'Downscaling' disabled to stop level scaling.

Settings.Name: Downscaling
Settings.Tooltip: Downlevel NPC's which are above the Party Level.

Settings.Name: HP
Settings.Tooltip: Increase HP by X.

Settings.Name: PercentHP
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase HP by X%.
0.05 means each NPC recieves a 5% max health bonus.

Settings.Name: AC
Settings.Tooltip: Increase AC by X.

Settings.Name: Attack
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Attack Rolls by X.

Settings.Name: DamageBonus
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Damage by X.

Settings.Name: Initiative
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Initiative by X.

Settings.Name: Physical
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Physical Ability Score by X, based on its highest physical stat.
( Strength or Dexterity )

Settings.Name: Casting
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Casting Ability Score by X, based on its spellcasting stat.
( Intelligence, Charisma, or Wisdom )

Settings.Name: Strength
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Strength Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Dexterity
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Dexterity Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Constitution
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Constitution Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Intelligence
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Intelligence Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Wisdom
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Wisdom Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Charisma
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Charisma Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: HP
Settings.Tooltip: Increase HP by X + Constitution Modifier each scaled level.

Settings.Name: PercentHP
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase HP by X% each scaled level.
0.05 means each NPC recieves a 5% max health bonus.

Settings.Name: AC
Settings.Tooltip: Increase AC by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Attack
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Attack Rolls by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: DamageBonus
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Damage by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Initiative
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Initiative by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Physical
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Physical Ability Score by X each scaled level, based on its highest physical stat.
( Strength or Dexterity )

Settings.Name: Casting
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Casting Ability Score by X each scaled level, based on its spellcasting stat.
( Intelligence, Charisma, or Wisdom )

Settings.Name: Strength
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Strength Ability Score by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Dexterity
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Dexterity Ability Score by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Constitution
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Constitution Ability Score by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Intelligence
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Intelligence Ability Score by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Wisdom
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Wisdom Ability Score by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Charisma
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Charisma Ability Score by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Movement
Settings.Tooltip: Movement speed determines how far you can move per turn.

Settings.Name: ActionPoint
Settings.Tooltip: Your primary resource in combat.

Settings.Name: BonusActionPoint
Settings.Tooltip: Your secondary resource in combat.

Settings.Name: ReactionActionPoint
Settings.Tooltip: Reactions, such as Opportunity Attacks, are responses you can have to events. Reactions can trigger both during and outside of your turn.

Settings.Name: Rage
Settings.Tooltip: The number of times you can enter a Rage.

Settings.Name: KiPoint
Settings.Tooltip: Ki is the magic that flows through all living beings. You can use Ki Points to fuel your advanced monk techniques.

Settings.Name: WildShape
Settings.Tooltip: The number of times you can assume the form of a Wild Shape, or cast Spells as a Dryad.

Settings.Name: ChannelOath
Settings.Tooltip: The number of times you can draw upon the strength of your Oath to power your actions.

Settings.Name: SorceryPoint
Settings.Tooltip: Sorcery Points are an important facet of a Sorcerer's power. They can be spent to augment Spells in unique and powerful ways, or converted to be used as fuel for Spell Slots. You may have up to 24 Sorcery Points at any given time.

Settings.Name: SuperiorityDie
Settings.Tooltip: Superiority dice are spent to empower manoeuvres, improving efficiency in combat.

Settings.Name: ChannelDivinity
Settings.Tooltip: The number of times you can channel your divine powers.

Settings.Name: BardicInspiration
Settings.Tooltip: Through stirring words and music, bards can inspire allies or augment their own attacks.

Settings.Name: SpellSlotLevel1
Settings.Tooltip: The levels at which this spell slot will be given, separated by ','.
